basnahira saha dakunu palath sabha mathiwaranayedi eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya pradhana wipakshaya wana eksath jathika pakshayata wada miliyanayaka wadi chanda sankhyawak ha eekabaddha wipakshayata wada panlaksha wisipandahasaka wadi chanda sankhyawak laba gena thibena bawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaye bhandagarika, yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathi dalas alahapperuma mahatha pawasayi.basnahira saha dakunu palath mathiwaranayedi rajaya parajaya karannayi batahira ratawal aniyamin danumdi thibu bawa ki amathiwaraya, ee sambandhayen rata athulatha pirisakata athiwa thibu wuwamanawa ha batahira wuwamanawa yana dekama mema mathiwarana prathipalayen parajayata pathwa thibena bawada penwa dunneya.
